trans-unit.source: Sets or clears the color key (transparency range) for a specified category

seg-source.mrk: Sets or clears the color key (transparency range) for a specified category

target.mrk: Sets or clears the color key (transparency range) for a specified category

trans-unit.source: Parameters
Pointer to an ImageAttribute object
[optional] The category for which the color key is set or cleared:

seg-source.mrk: The category for which the color key is set or cleared:

target.mrk: The category for which the color key is set or cleared:

trans-unit.source: 0 - Color adjustment applies to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own

seg-source.mrk: 0 - Color adjustment applies to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own

target.mrk: 0 - Color adjustment applies to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own

trans-unit.source: 1 - Color adjustment applies to bitmapped images

seg-source.mrk: 1 - Color adjustment applies to bitmapped images

target.mrk: 1 - Color adjustment applies to bitmapped images

trans-unit.source: 2 - Color adjustment applies to brush operations in metafiles

seg-source.mrk: 2 - Color adjustment applies to brush operations in metafiles

target.mrk: 2 - Color adjustment applies to brush operations in metafiles

trans-unit.source: 3 - Color adjustment applies to pen operations in metafiles

seg-source.mrk: 3 - Color adjustment applies to pen operations in metafiles

target.mrk: 3 - Color adjustment applies to pen operations in metafiles

trans-unit.source: 4 - Color adjustment applies to text drawn in metafiles

seg-source.mrk: 4 - Color adjustment applies to text drawn in metafiles

target.mrk: 4 - Color adjustment applies to text drawn in metafiles

trans-unit.source: [optional] If True, transparency range for the specified category is applied; otherwise, transparency

seg-source.mrk: If True, transparency range for the specified category is applied; otherwise, transparency

target.mrk: If True, transparency range for the specified category is applied; otherwise, transparency

trans-unit.source: [optional] Alpha, Red, Green and Blue components of a color that specifies the low color-key value

seg-source.mrk: Alpha, Red, Green and Blue components of a color that specifies the low color-key value

target.mrk: Alpha, Red, Green and Blue components of a color that specifies the low color-key value

trans-unit.source: [optional] Alpha, Red, Green and Blue components of a color that specifies the high color-key value

seg-source.mrk: Alpha, Red, Green and Blue components of a color that specifies the high color-key value

target.mrk: Alpha, Red, Green and Blue components of a color that specifies the high color-key value

trans-unit.source: Return Value
True.
False and sets the @error flag to non-zero, @extended may contain GPSTATUS error code ($GPID_ERR*).

seg-source.mrk: False and sets the @error flag to non-zero, @extended may contain GPSTATUS error code ($GPID_ERR*).

target.mrk: False and sets the @error flag to non-zero, @extended may contain GPSTATUS error code ($GPID_ERR*).

trans-unit.source: Remarks
Any color that has each of its three components (red, green, blue) between the corresponding components of the high and low color keys is made transparent.

seg-source.mrk: Any color that has each of its three components (red, green, blue) between the corresponding components of the high and low color keys is made transparent.

target.mrk: Any color that has each of its three components (red, green, blue) between the corresponding components of the high and low color keys is made transparent.

Search GdipSetImageAttributesColorKeys in MSDN Library.
